Trade/Device Name(s): ePlex Blood Culture Identification Fungal Pathogen (BCID-FP) Panel
Regulation Name(s): Multiplex nucleic acid assay for identification of microorganisms and resistance markers from positive blood cultures
Specimen Type(s): Blood culture samples identified as positive by a continuous monitoring blood culture system and which contain fungal organism
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for GenMark ePlex Blood Culture Identification Fungal Pathogen (BCID-FP) Panel detecting multiple pathogenic fungi from positive blood culture using multiplex nucleic acid hybridization and PCR on the ePlex instrument
Indications for Use Summary: Qualitative multiplex nucleic acid test for simultaneous detection and identification of multiple pathogenic fungal organisms in positive blood culture on the ePlex instrument; aids in diagnosis of bloodstream infection in conjunction with other clinical information and Gram stain results
